The August 2025 update to Visual Studio brings a smarter Copilot, MCP general availability, and more control.

### Highlights

Here’s what’s new with GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio 2022 (v17.14):

- **GPT-5 model support**: Use GPT-5 to leverage more powerful, accurate, and context-aware code suggestions and chat experiences directly in Visual Studio.
- **MCP support is now generally available**: Connect your entire stack with MCP. Get started with one-click server installation and secure integrated sign in.
- **Smarter Copilot Chat with better context**: Access a smarter Copilot Chat that retrieves your most relevant code snippets and understands your Git history
- **Bring your own model**: Connect your own models to Visual Studio Chat using API keys from OpenAI, Google, or Anthropic.
- **Sign up with Google**: Sign up for GitHub Copilot directly from Visual Studio — now with your Google account.
- **Greater control over Copilot suggestions**: Choose when Copilot completions should appear, decide when to access next edit suggestions, and accept completions partially word-by-word or line-by-line.

[Download Visual Studio](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?sku=Community&channel=Release&version=VS2022&source=VSLandingPage&cid=2030&passive=false) to experience all the new Copilot features today. To learn more about what’s new, check out the Visual Studio [blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/the-visual-studio-august-update-is-here-smarter-ai-better-debugging-and-more-control/) and [release notes](https://learn.microsoft.com/visualstudio/releases/2022/release-notes?tabs=August).

### Next in Visual Studio Copilot

Here’s a sneak peek of what’s coming next for Copilot in Visual Studio:

- New modes for Debugging and Profiling
- Enhanced agent mode performance and functionality
- MCP prompt, resources, sampling, and registry support
- Copilot-powered all-in-one search

And this is just a small sample of upcoming improvements. Explore our [full roadmap](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/roadmap-for-ai-in-visual-studio-september/) for all the upcoming features and share your feedback with us!
